worked, and i learned how the new highway had dramatically reduced foot traffic through town. yet here he was, creating with the same passion and precision as his ancestors had for centuries.i knew i wanted the beautiful chandua showing lord jagannath as krishna. the detail was breathtaking each stitch placed with devotion and skill. this wasn t just a souvenir it was a piece of odisha s soul. every stitch preserves a tradition that has been part of odisha s identity for centuries.sometimes, the most meaningful connections happen when we take the road less travelled. when we slow down to
